digraph LondonPavementOddities{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue];mainIdea[label="Pavement Oddities in London", shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightgreen];hiddenRivers[label="1. Hidden Rivers

- Plaques for famous musicians in Camden"];millenniumNews[label="7. News from Last Millennium
- Pavement ads for cultural events"];hpSource[label="8. HP Source
- Hydraulic power point from 19th century"];randomQuotes[label="9. Random Quotes
- Heritage inscriptions on pavement"];mrBennPlaque[label="10. Mr Benn Plaque
- Commemorates children's author David McKee"];woodBlockPaving[label="11. Wood-Block Paving

- Unusual road markings to deter parking"];oneJob[label="14. You Had One Job
- Misleading road sign instructions"];stonemasonsMarks[label="15. Stonemasons' Marks
